org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose

Class SweepLine.EdgeBinaryTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.BinarySearchTree<SweepLine.Edge>
      • org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose.SweepLine.EdgeBinaryTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<SweepLine.Edge>
    Enclosing class:
    SweepLine

    protected static class SweepLine.EdgeBinaryTree
extends BinarySearchTree<SweepLine.Edge>
    Class to extend the BinarySearchTree to add a method for finding the SweepLine.Edge closest to a given SweepLine.Vertex.
    Since:
    2.2.0
    Version:
    2.2.0
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Detail

      • findClosest

        public SweepLine.Edge findClosest(SweepLine.Vertex vertex)
        Performs a search to find the right most SweepLine.Edge who is left of the given SweepLine.Vertex.

        If the tree is empty null is returned.

        Parameters:
        vertex - the SweepLine.Vertex
        Returns:
        SweepLine.Edge the closest edge
